page.title: 15POPULATION IN EYKE PARISH
page.content:
The population is very scattered. There are three hamlets in the area; Friday Street, Spratt Street and the area around the Rookery Farm.
In Friday Street there are 24 adults including 1 American, 3 preschool children and 1 school age child.
4 adults live at Spratt Street and one weekender. There are two school age children.
In the Rookery area there are 19 adults, 2 school age and 2 preschool age children. 2 houses are occupied by 4 Americans and 2 children. 9 people are retired, and 38 of working age. There are 10 children, two of them under 5.
